extendedInfo.description: Includes the Hempgate "leaked" files and the Ultimate Hemp news mashup to keep up on Cannabis news daily.What is Hemp and why is it crucial to our future?How on Earth Hemp is illegal?This fun informative app treats it like an investigation.  Teach your grandpa, teach the children.  Hemp is our most bountiful and ecological resource and it needs to be restored today.Featuring:-Tons of facts and diagrams-Links to pdf docs and other info-Persons of interest profiles-RSS news mashups to keep up on Hemp news!-Option to start in news mode-Ways to get active--------------This app is for info-tainment purposes.  You can also view the content any time at the mobile friendly hempgate.us website.  The app version works off the grid without a connection!Hemp is relevant to green sustainable ecology and the environment, relating to energy, fuel, gas, and the farming industry.These issues involve local jobs, debt, and industry, and affect us all.Hemp has only been illegal for about 75 years. The history of the marijuana law, crime, and conspiracy, teach us that weed is only illegal for industrial reasons!We provide this for free-  if you'd like to support us, please buy our Cannabis Pocket Reference, and get a wealth of 420 Cannabis info for under $3!!

reviews.title: Good information, does what it says
reviews.comment: \"nothing special that can\'t be found on the internet with enough time and effort\" DUH, but they conveniently put that information together in an app..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Informative but nothing special that can\'t be found on the internet with enough time and effort put in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lol everything is on the net. This presents lots of facts and is amusing. A- needs more ways to help.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lots of info, well organized, free and no ads. Please keep updating!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Amazing! Changed the way i look at weed and history forever. LEGALIZE IT!
reviews.author: A Google User
